org.springframework.boot.availability

Class ApplicationAvailabilityBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.availability.ApplicationAvailabilityBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, ApplicationAvailability, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<AvailabilityChangeEvent<?>>

    public class ApplicationAvailabilityBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApplicationAvailability, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<AvailabilityChangeEvent<?>>
    Bean that provides an ApplicationAvailability implementation by listening for change events.
    Since:
    2.3.0
    See Also:
    ApplicationAvailability
